title: Infrastructure Bootstrap and DevOps Setup
acceptance_criteria: Cloud infrastructure deployed with secure networking and IAM roles
CI/CD pipelines operational with feature flag support and audit trails
Sandbox environment seeded with synthetic data and simulators
Monitoring and alerting dashboards live with baseline SLAs
Security controls including WAF, Secrets Manager, and KMS implemented

title: Core Data Models and Event Pipeline Implementation
acceptance_criteria: Core data schemas deployed with constraints and indexes
Event ingestion pipeline validates and stores events with privacy enforcement
Data quality and lineage monitoring active with alerts
DSAR export and deletion workflows operational
Analytics dashboards display key KPIs with freshness SLAs
External adapter integrations functional and emitting events

title: Authentication, Authorization, and User Onboarding
acceptance_criteria: Authentication flows secure and rate-limited
Onboarding wizard complete with step gating and autosave
ID verification gating Instant Book and payouts enforced
Safe-Mode and age gating applied on public profiles
Media upload with moderation and SFW enforcement
Profile completeness scoring and publish checklists functional

title: Search Infrastructure and API Development
acceptance_criteria: Search indices updated within 5 minutes of data changes
GraphQL search API supports all filters, sorting, and pagination
Safe-Mode filtering enforced on public queries
Autocomplete and suggestions functional with typo tolerance
Paid promotions integrated with eligibility and fraud controls
Admin tools for curation and monitoring operational
Search latency and error SLOs met

title: Booking and Checkout System
acceptance_criteria: Booking modes and state transitions implemented with calendar conflict checks
Stripe payments integrated with escrow, deposits, refunds, and chargebacks
Smart Docs CMS generates and manages e-sign contracts blocking payment until signed
Atomic LBG confirmation with separate Talent and Studio ledgers
Admin finance consoles with dual approvals and immutable audit logs
Payouts scheduled with reserve and early payout controls
SLOs for checkout latency and payment success met

title: Messaging and Inbox System
acceptance_criteria: Messaging threads support Inquiry and Project types with role and booking context
Message requests gate new contacts with accept/decline/block and credit limits
Action cards implement booking workflows with idempotency and audit
Attachments scanned for virus and NSFW, Safe-Mode enforced on previews
Inbox supports folders, filters, search, pin/archive, and spam controls
Notifications respect quiet hours and user preferences with digest batching
Admin moderation consoles with case-bound access and immutable audit logs
Messaging latency and throughput SLOs met

title: Studio Marketplace and Management
acceptance_criteria: Studio listings support detailed amenities, pricing, and availability with blackout enforcement
Host onboarding wizard and media upload with moderation and Safe-Mode enforcement
Calendar management with ICS export/import and conflict detection
Deposit policies with Stripe auth-only holds and claim workflows
Public studio pages with SFW media and SEO structured data
Atomic attach-in-flow with separate deposit authorization
Admin verification queue and policy management with immutable audit logs
KPIs on publish-to-booking time, deposit claims, and verification SLA met

title: Reviews and Reputation System
acceptance_criteria: Reviews accepted only from eligible completed bookings with double-blind enforcement
Fraud detection auto-hides suspicious reviews and queues for moderation
Reputation scores computed with decay and penalties, displayed with verified badges
Admin moderation console supports hide/remove/restore with immutable audit logs
Integration with search ranking and user notifications
Performance and fraud detection SLOs met

title: Trust & Safety and Verification Center
acceptance_criteria: ID verification required for Instant Book and payouts with age gating enforced
Background checks opt-in with Trusted Pro badges and fee nudges
Social verification with OAuth integration and nightly sync
Risk scoring triggers payout holds and feature gating
Safe-Mode filtering blocks NSFW content for guests and new users
Admin consoles with dual approval and immutable audit logs
Automoderation with escalating enforcement and evidence retention
SLOs for verification turnaround and moderation response met

title: Smart Docs and Legal Document Management
acceptance_criteria: Smart Docs CMS supports versioned, role- and city-aware templates with clause library
Documents generated per booking leg with variable binding and validation
E-signature workflows block payment until all required signatures complete
Immutable PDFs stored with SHA-256 hashes and WORM retention
Admin consoles for template management with dual approval and audit logs
Notifications for signing events with retries and error handling
SLOs for document generation and signing met

title: Finance and Billing System
acceptance_criteria: Platform fees and taxes computed per leg with marketplace facilitator logic
Double-entry ledger with idempotent Stripe webhook reconciliation
Buyer wallet supports credits, debits, and reversals with caps
Monthly seller and buyer statements generated with tax details
Admin consoles with dual approval and immutable audit logs
Cost and performance SLOs for fee computation and daily close met

title: Communications and Notification System
acceptance_criteria: Multi-channel templated messaging with user preferences and quiet hours
Immutable consent ledger and suppression with one-click unsubscribe
Admin consoles for template and suppression management with audit logs
Domain authentication and bounce/complaint handling implemented
Localization and accessibility compliance met
Link tracking respects privacy and DNT
Deliverability monitoring and cost controls active

title: Growth Features: Saved Searches, Boards, Referrals, and Feed
acceptance_criteria: Saved searches support complex filters with frequency caps and Safe-Mode
Boards manage mixed content with collaborator approvals and privacy
Referral system enforces caps, fraud detection, and clawbacks
Unified feed with role tabs, verified badges, and Safe-Mode filtering
Sharecards and link-in-bio microsites generate UTM/QR codes
Book-Again reminders with prefilled drafts and opt-out options
Telemetry and dashboards monitor usage and cost within budgets

title: Portfolio and Case Studies Management
acceptance_criteria: Portfolio supports media upload with collaborator approval and Safe-Mode enforcement
Case studies include 'Request Similar Shoot' linking to prefilled RFPs
DMCA reports route to admin with audit and takedown workflows
Media pipeline enforces virus and NSFW scanning with watermarking
SEO JSON-LD valid and excludes non-SFW content
Telemetry and dashboards track portfolio engagement and approvals

title: FanSubscription Creator Features
acceptance_criteria: FanSub creators manage subscriptions, requests, tips, and PPV with 18+ gating
Media watermarking and entitlement tokens enforce access control
Stripe billing integrated with subscription lifecycle and refunds
Moderation and DMCA workflows with audit and appeals implemented
GraphQL APIs and admin consoles support eligibility and finance operations
Telemetry and KPIs monitor earnings, churn, and moderation

title: Help Center and Support Ticketing System
acceptance_criteria: Help Center supports categorized articles with search and guided flows
Support ticketing manages typed cases with evidence and refund automation
DMCA workflows with takedown and counter-notice implemented
Admin consoles with RBAC, audit logs, macros, and SLA management
Email bridge supports inbound/outbound with DKIM/DMARC and threading
Accessibility and localization standards met
SLA targets for response and resolution achieved

title: Admin Console and Operational Tooling
acceptance_criteria: Admin Console enforces least privilege and JIT elevation with immutable audit logs
Role-based access controls separate finance, trust, support, content, and engineering duties
Dual approvals required for money moves and safety-impacting actions
Immutable audit streams stored with WORM and chain hashes
Operational dashboards and alerts monitor admin actions and system health
Admin workflows support case management, refunds, moderation, search curation, and feature flag governance

title: SEO, Performance, Accessibility, and Internationalization
acceptance_criteria: SEO canonical URLs, robots.txt, sitemaps, and hreflang implemented correctly
Structured data valid and excludes sensitive content
Core Web Vitals budgets met on mobile and desktop
WCAG 2.1/2.2 AA accessibility compliance verified
Internationalization with locale detection, ICU formatting, and RTL support
Error pages and redirects handle legacy and malformed URLs
Performance budgets met with caching and optimized assets

title: Experimentation and Analytics Framework
acceptance_criteria: Experimentation platform supports multiple test designs with pre-registered metrics
Deterministic assignment with stratification and stickiness implemented
Exposure and conversion events logged with privacy compliance
Semantic-layer metrics catalog with versioning and lineage enforced
Dashboards monitor experiment health and guardrails with auto-rollback
Data quality tests and anomaly detection active
Experimentation integrates with search, promotions, and growth features

title: City Launch and Growth Operations
acceptance_criteria: City launch plans with phased milestones and go/no-go gates
City-specific KPIs and dashboards operational
Supply and demand seeding playbooks executed with verified participants
Local marketing campaigns with geo-targeted ads and events
Cross-functional city teams staffed and coordinated
Playbooks for troubleshooting and risk mitigation in place
Continuous knowledge sharing and improvement processes established

title: Operational Readiness, Security, and Compliance
acceptance_criteria: Incident management with SEV levels, on-call, and runbooks operational
Security controls enforce least privilege, JIT elevation, and audit logging
Compliance with GDPR, CCPA, PCI DSS, FCRA, DMCA, and accessibility standards
DSAR export and deletion workflows implemented with SLA adherence
Quarterly drills for disaster recovery and security incidents conducted
Risk registers maintained with owners, dashboards, and mitigation plans
Vulnerability management and secrets rotation processes active

title: Documentation, Runbooks, and Knowledge Base
acceptance_criteria: Comprehensive documentation covering architecture, APIs, admin, and runbooks
Help center articles aligned with user-facing copy and SEO optimized
Version-controlled appendices with executive summaries and usage guides
Training materials for support, trust & safety, finance, and engineering teams
Documentation publishing and changelog tracking tooling operational
Audit logging for documentation changes and approvals

title: Orchestrator Improvements and Meta-QA
acceptance_criteria: Orchestrator supports idempotent operations and robust state management
Agent prompts improved for clarity and efficiency
Meta-QA workflows automate quality checks and support manual reviews
Usage tracking captures agent activity and system metrics
Integration with existing workflows without regressions
Documentation and training materials for orchestrator and QA
